Gemspec/DevelopmentDependencies.description:
Description

Checks that development dependencies are specified in Gemfile rather than gemspec.
Gemspec/DevelopmentDependencies.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: Gemfile (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['Gemfile', 'gems.rb', 'gemspec'] (type: list)
AllowedGems: [] (type: list)
